BetterClothing.description: Mods to improve the clothing system in general.

Body.description: Body-related mods to improve the skeleton, textures and more.

CPMDB.label: Cyberpunk Clothing Mod Database
CPMDB.description: These mods are featured in the Cyberpunk clothing mod database project.

ChooseArchive.description:
These mods require you to choose one of the `.archive` files after
installing it to choose the variant to use.

Console.description:
These mods add functionality to the CET console, or are primarily
used through the console.

Core.label: Core mods
Core.description: Absolute minimum core mods needed by other mods to work.

Core2.label: Essential mods
Core2.description: Essential mods that you do not want to play without.

Core3.label: Important mods
Core3.description: Important mods, but that you can live without.

CustomMod.description: Custom mods that have no online source.

FallbackInstaller.description: This mod is known to have caused Vortex to use its fallback installer.

GarmentSupport.description: The items added by this mod come with garment support, which enables automatic tucking and adjustments.

Hair.description: Hair-related mods to improve and/or add hair, textures and more.

HiRes.label: High Resolution Textures
HiRes.description: High resolution textures for different aspects of the game, from environment textures to NPCs.

ItemCodes.description: Item codes for the items added by this mod.

MaleV.description: This mod is compatible with male characters.

ManualDL.label: Manual Download
ManualDL.description: This mod requires you to download the files manually - the mod manager download option is not available.

NEW.description: Newly added mod that has not been tested in the game yet.

Photos.description: Mods around the photo mode, from enhancements to pose packs and more.

Poses.description: Mods that add pose packs for the photo mode or to use with AMM.

Quest.description: Mods that add or modify quests.

ReadNotes.description:
It is recommended to read the mod's official description,
as there are important usage instructions there.

Store.description: These are virtual atelier mods that add clothing items.

Vanilla.description: This mod is compatible with the vanilla game.
